name: Harester
description:
Aaahh, harvest, your favorite time of the year. Fresh carrots everywhere. Shame that they are guarded by bloodthirsty hounds and hungry farmers. Sneak your way to the glorious carrot fields and bring home 10 carrots to make your favorite carrot casserole without being caught.

Controls: 

arrow keys to move

spacebar to pick up and drop carrots, restart
